Acceptance Of Terms

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.2.2" text_font="Open Sans||||||||" text_text_color="#000000" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="1.5em" header_font="Montserrat|600|||||||" header_text_color="#222222" header_font_size="26px" header_line_height="1.04em" header_2_font="Montserrat|600|||||||" header_2_text_color="#222222" header_2_font_size="25px" header_2_line_height="1.08em" custom_margin="||2.3rem||false|false" custom_padding="0px||||false|false" header_font_size_tablet="" header_font_size_phone="23px" header_font_size_last_edited="on|phone" header_2_font_size_tablet="" header_2_font_size_phone="22px" header_2_font_size_last_edited="on|phone"]This agreement (‘agreement’) is made between the person named in the web form (‘you’, ‘your’, ‘yours’) for use of services offered by HealthQuoteHero.comthrough its web properties (‘Service’, ‘Website’) and shall govern your willing participation in the Service described herein. Terms of the Service may be revised and updated at any time in our sole discretion. Your continued access or use of the Service constitutes your acceptance of the changes. Your access and use of the Service will be subject to the most current version of the terms and conditions, rules and guidelines posted on the Website at the time of such use.[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label="Description Of Service" _builder_version="4.2.2" text_font="Open Sans||||||||" text_text_color="#000000" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="1.5em" header_font="Montserrat|600|||||||" header_text_color="#222222" header_font_size="26px" header_line_height="1.04em" header_2_font="Montserrat|600|||||||" header_2_text_color="#222222" header_2_font_size="25px" header_2_line_height="1.08em" custom_margin="||1.3rem||false|false" custom_padding="0px||||false|false" header_font_size_tablet="" header_font_size_phone="23px" header_font_size_last_edited="on|phone" header_2_font_size_tablet="" header_2_font_size_phone="22px" header_2_font_size_last_edited="on|phone"]

Description Of Service

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.2.2" text_font="Open Sans||||||||" text_text_color="#000000" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="1.5em" header_font="Montserrat|600|||||||" header_text_color="#222222" header_font_size="26px" header_line_height="1.04em" header_2_font="Montserrat|600|||||||" header_2_text_color="#222222" header_2_font_size="25px" header_2_line_height="1.08em" custom_margin="||2.3rem||false|false" custom_padding="0px||||false|false" header_font_size_tablet="" header_font_size_phone="23px" header_font_size_last_edited="on|phone" header_2_font_size_tablet="" header_2_font_size_phone="22px" header_2_font_size_last_edited="on|phone"]Upon completion of our web form and agreement to these terms, you are eligible to be matched with Health Insurance providers and 3rd parties (‘affiliates’) via direct link, email and phone. You are also eligible to be matched with affiliates over time, via email and your active participation by clicking on web links.[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label="Use Of Service" _builder_version="4.2.2" text_font="Open Sans||||||||" text_text_color="#000000" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="1.5em" header_font="Montserrat|600|||||||" header_text_color="#222222" header_font_size="26px" header_line_height="1.04em" header_2_font="Montserrat|600|||||||" header_2_text_color="#222222" header_2_font_size="25px" header_2_line_height="1.08em" custom_margin="||1.3rem||false|false" custom_padding="0px||||false|false" header_font_size_tablet="" header_font_size_phone="23px" header_font_size_last_edited="on|phone" header_2_font_size_tablet="" header_2_font_size_phone="22px" header_2_font_size_last_edited="on|phone"]

Use Of Service

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.2.2" text_font="Open Sans||||||||" text_text_color="#000000" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="1.5em" header_font="Montserrat|600|||||||" header_text_color="#222222" header_font_size="26px" header_line_height="1.04em" header_2_font="Montserrat|600|||||||" header_2_text_color="#222222" header_2_font_size="25px" header_2_line_height="1.08em" custom_margin="||2.3rem||false|false" custom_padding="0px||||false|false" header_font_size_tablet="" header_font_size_phone="23px" header_font_size_last_edited="on|phone" header_2_font_size_tablet="" header_2_font_size_phone="22px" header_2_font_size_last_edited="on|phone"]You must be at least 18 years of age. Disclaimer, No Warranty, Limited Liability

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.2.2" text_font="Open Sans||||||||" text_text_color="#000000" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="1.5em" header_font="Montserrat|600|||||||" header_text_color="#222222" header_font_size="26px" header_line_height="1.04em" header_2_font="Montserrat|600|||||||" header_2_text_color="#222222" header_2_font_size="25px" header_2_line_height="1.08em" custom_margin="||2.3rem||false|false" custom_padding="0px||||false|false" header_font_size_tablet="" header_font_size_phone="23px" header_font_size_last_edited="on|phone" header_2_font_size_tablet="" header_2_font_size_phone="22px" header_2_font_size_last_edited="on|phone"]The content of the Website is informational in nature only – there is no assurance that information provided is accurate. HealthQuoteHero, the registered owner of the website, does not recommend or endorse any specific health insurance company and does not provide advice on which insurer to select or which products to buy. Notwithstanding any language to the contrary, nothing contained herein constitutes or is intended to constitute an offer, inducement, promise, or contract of any kind. We are not responsible or liable for any consequences relating directly or indirectly to any action or inaction you take based on the information provided on the Website. Without limiting the foregoing, we make no representations or warranties about the accuracy, reliability, completeness, or timeliness of the content provided on the Website. Any links to other web sites are provided as a courtesy. They are not intended to nor do they constitute an endorsement by us.[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label="Links To The Web Site" _builder_version="4.2.2" text_font="Open Sans||||||||" text_text_color="#000000" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="1.5em" header_font="Montserrat|600|||||||" header_text_color="#222222" header_font_size="26px" header_line_height="1.04em" header_2_font="Montserrat|600|||||||" header_2_text_color="#222222" header_2_font_size="25px" header_2_line_height="1.08em" custom_margin="||1.3rem||false|false" custom_padding="0px||||false|false" header_font_size_tablet="" header_font_size_phone="23px" header_font_size_last_edited="on|phone" header_2_font_size_tablet="" header_2_font_size_phone="22px" header_2_font_size_last_edited="on|phone"]
